publicationVenue.name: Optical Fiber Communications Conference and Exhibition

title: DDOS attack identification via a silicon photonic Deep Neural Network with 50 GHz input and weight update
abstract: We experimentally demonstrate distributed denial of service (DDOS) attack identification using Deep Learning over a photonic neuromorphic engine that supports both input signal and weight update at 50 GHz, reporting a Cohen’s κ-score of 0.636.
venue: Optical Fiber Communications Conference and Exhibition

journal.name: 2023 Optical Fiber Communications Conference and Exhibition (OFC)

citations.title: Photonic neural networks and optics-informed deep learning fundamentals
